1. Enforcements are final
## Subtext
- Incidents of admin abuse, negligence, or disputed rulings can be taken up in the Discord server. Almost all bans can be appealed in our Discord. Contacting the administration team is only acceptable via these means when attempting to appeal.
## Types of bans - Role Ban - A.K.A a job ban, this type prevents your character from joining/late joining a round as one or more jobs or roles. These are usually used in response to problematic behavior in specific departments or address gross experience in important roles like heads of staff. These bans don’t prevent you from switching to the role during a round or acting as that role, but doing so is considered ban evasion. - Game Ban - A.K.A a server ban, this ban prevents you from connecting to the Jamboree server.
## Ban Durations - Temporary - Temporary bans are lifted automatically after a certain period of time. If they are a game ban, they will tell you how much time is remaining when you try to connect. - Indefinite - These bans will only be removed on a successful appeal in the discord. Any ban that doesn’t tell you when it expires or doesn’t specify otherwise can be assumed to be an indefinite ban. - Voucher - This is an indefinite ban which can be only appealed with both a successful appeal and requires a voucher of good behavior from the administrative team or a well known/decently active SS13/SS14 server. Voucher bans can typically only be appealed after at least six months of its issuing. A voucher ban is typically placed on players as a result of unsuccessful appeal of an indefinite game ban by players with a history of bans and of causing issues. - Permanent - This ban is only appealable if it was inappropriately placed. If the appeal results in the ban being determined to be appropriately placed, the ban may not be appealed again and will not be lifted. These bans will typically be applied to players who continually cause problems even after a voucher ban or users who have completely unacceptable behavior.
Attempts to circumvent or bypass a game ban will result in a permanent ban.
